name: The museum (Laciaus)
description:
The player, a kid, is stuck in a museum with famous artworks. They discover that there is a bigger world inside these paintings. The player is given a quest from characters that are in these paintings that require jumping between the paintings and once all of those are completed, they can escape.

Team Members:
Atakan Tunçel  --  Game Designer
Orhan Yavuz Erhan  --  Artist
Emir Giray Yöndemli  --  Programmer
Oğuz Emre Mutlu  --  Story Teller
